name: Hello World
description: Scaffolding for a Lens Open Action implementing a Smart Post
long-description: The 'Hello World CLI' simplifies the journey into digital content creation, especially for newcomers to smart posts. It offers the tools and guidance, making the process more approachable and less intimidating for those new to Open Actions.

description: Unlock full content with a payment, bridging curiosity and exclusive access for readers.
long-description: Turn your digital space into a revenue source by renting out post space for ads.

description: Turn your digital space into a revenue source by renting out post space for ads.
long-description: Tipping transforms user appreciation into tangible support. This feature embeds a culture of direct financial encouragement within the community, enabling followers to actively support and sustain the creative work of their favorite creators.
